GLME01
Luigi's Mansion

Infinite Elements. [Link Master]
040B0E40 60000000
040B0D00 60000000
Co-author: Jay007

Element Modifier [Link Master]
284CAFD0 00000008
48000000 803A2B84
DE000000 80008180
10001187 00000001
E2000002 80008000
284CAFD0 00000004
48000000 803A2B84
DE000000 80008180
10001187 00000002
E2000002 80008000
284CAFD0 00000001
48000000 803A2B84
DE000000 80008180
10001187 00000003
E2000002 80008000
284CAFD0 00000002
48000000 803A2B84
DE000000 80008180
10001187 00000004
E2000002 80008000

Co-author: Jay007
D-pad Up - None
D-pad Down - Fire
D-pad Left - Ice
D-pad Right - Water
The Element Modifier will allow you to have which ever of the 3
elements you want at any given time. You can also have no element.
If you don't collect an element spirit, your meter will appear
empty. You'll still be able to use it, but you won't be able to
fire blasts. Use in conjunction with the Infinite Fire/Ice/Water
to fully use any element at any time.

Universal Codes for Luigi's Mansion

Infinite Health [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
D8010150 80010154
14000008 60000000
E0000000 80008000
*Health won't increase nor decrease*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rh38Co3DAA8
*Credits to Ozelot*

999.999.999 G-Points [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
807F03A8 801F03AC
D2000008 00000002
3C603B9A 6063C9FF
90660008 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Load a profile to take effect*
*Credits to Ozelot*

E0000000 80008000
*Credits to Ozelot*

Invincibility [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
D03F110C 80010034
D2000018 00000002
3D804000 918310C4
C02310C4 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Flashing character but immune to damage*
*Credits to Ozelot*

Sudden Death [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
D8010150 80010154
14000004 38000000
E0000000 80008000
*Die immediately when health modified*

Screen Zoom Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
57E01838 EC62093A
D2000014 00000002
3D80XXXX 91840020
C0240020 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XXXX = Float*
*3F80 = Default*
*Picture: http://s1.directupload.net/images/140316/v4s45uvu.png
